   How Hypnosis Works 
 Our understanding of hypnosis has advanced a great deal in
the past century, but the phenomenon still holds many mysteries. Take a look
at some popular theories of hypnosis and explore the various ways hypnotists
put their art to work in this HowStuffWorks article.  
Also at HowStuffWorks
 How Strikes Work - Labor strikes can cause major disruptions to industry, commerce
and the lives of people who aren't even connected to the strike itself. Learn
about the effects of strikes and the complex reasons behind them.
 
How Start-up Capital works - When you start a new business, you need money to get it off
the ground. Learn about the various types of capital available to new
businesses, including what venture capital and "angel investors" can offer.
 

How Radon Works - If you live in certain parts of the United States,
you might be aware of the threat that radon gas poses. Radon gas is
radioactive, and in tightly insulated houses it can accumulate to
concentrations that pose a health threat. Find out how radon works and the
health risks associated with it.
   
This Week's Video 

How the Nintendo Wii Works - The Nintendo 
Wii has been generating impressive sales and receiving rave reviews for its 
innovative controller and emphasis on fun and gameplay over graphical 
pyrotechnics. In this video from HowStuffWorks, learn what
sets the Wii apart from other video game consoles.
